data.title: China-Cambodia effort nets 240 Chinese suspects in anti-fraud campaign - The Cambodia Daily

data.title: ADB's $50-mn loan to support policy reform to boost trade in Cambodia - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: The Asian Development Bank recently approved a $50-million policy-based loan to support Cambodia's efforts to make its business environment more investment-friendly, upgrade businesses towards higher competitiveness and ease trade barriers.

data.title: China-Cambodia trade in Jan-Oct 2024 worth $14.4 bn; up 19% YoY - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Imports from Cambodia to China grew by 20 per cent YoY and Chinese enterprises signed investment agreements in Cambodia worth nearly $3 billion during the period.
